metadata.name: nonce Membership Genesis Silver
metadata.description:
A basecamp for future rebels. While also known as the crypto-startup incubator community, we are a town of 150+ members co-living & co-working in seven buildings. Inspired by the cryptographic term 'nonce' — an unknown yet critical number that cryptographers decode to generate the next blocks —  our community curates, connects, and cultivates every dreamer to decrypt their infinite possibilities against all odds.

Join nonce! For details, please check the Nonce white paper.
metadata.criteria:
Step 1: Apply for an invitation and make sure to provide your wallet address during the application process (nonce.community/apply)

Step 2: Check your email for an invitation letter, which will confirm your participation

Step 3: Connect your wallet to the membership page and mint your SBT.
